ABSI.name: All ABSI +1
ABSI.desc: Your Ability Scores each increase by 1

FlightPower.name: Flight 30ft
FlightPower.desc: You have a flying speed of 30 feet. To fly, you can't be wearing medium or heavy armor

FlightPower.name: Flight 40ft
FlightPower.desc: You have a flying speed of 40 feet. To fly, you can't be wearing medium or heavy armor

WeaponPower.name: Natural Weapon, 1d4
WeaponPower.desc: You have a natural weapon that deals 1d4 damage; it doesn't require a free hand and is classified as 'Finesse'.

WeaponPower.name: Natural Weapon, 1d6
WeaponPower.desc: You have a natural weapon that deals 1d6 damage; it doesn't require a free hand and is classified as 'Finesse'.

WeaponPower.name: Natural Weapon, 1d8
WeaponPower.desc: You have a natural weapon that deals 1d8 damage; it doesn't require a free hand and is classified as 'Finesse'.

WeaponPower.name: Natural Weapon, 1d10
WeaponPower.desc: You have a natural weapon that deals 1d10 damage; it doesn't require a free hand and is classified as 'Finesse'.

Powers.name: Amphibious
Powers.desc: You can breathe air and water

Powers.name: Elemental Strike
Powers.desc: As a an action, in a 60 feet range, make a ranged attack using INT/WIS/CHA. On hit, the target takes 1d10 damage. The damage increases by 1d10 when you reach 5th, 11th, and 17th level

Powers.name: Enhance: Strength Checks
Powers.desc: You have advantage on Strength checks

Powers.name: Enhance: Strength Saves
Powers.desc: You have advantage on Strength Saves

Powers.name: Enhance: Dexterity Checks
Powers.desc: You have advantage on Dexterity checks

Powers.name: Enhance: Dexterity Saves
Powers.desc: You have advantage on Dexterity Saves

Powers.name: Enhance: Constitution Checks
Powers.desc: You have advantage on Constitution checks

Powers.name: Enhance: Constitution Saves
Powers.desc: You have advantage on Constitution Saves

Powers.name: Enhance: Intelligence Checks
Powers.desc: You have advantage on Intelligence checks

Powers.name: Enhance: Intelligence Saves
Powers.desc: You have advantage on Intelligence Saves

Powers.name: Enhance: Wisdom Checks
Powers.desc: You have advantage on Wisdom checks

Powers.name: Enhance: Wisdom Saves
Powers.desc: You have advantage on Wisdom Saves

Powers.name: Enhance: Charisma Checks
Powers.desc: You have advantage on Charisma checks

Powers.name: Enhance: Charisma Saves
Powers.desc: You have advantage on Charisma Saves

Powers.name: Feat
Powers.desc: You gain one feat of your choice

Powers.name: Fog Cloud
Powers.desc: As an action, you create a 20-foot radius of fog centered on you. The sphere spreads arounds corners, and its area is heavily obscured. It lasts for 1 hour, until a wind of at least 10 miles per hour disperses it, or until you create another fog cloud. This trait requires 'INT/WIS/CHA Concentration'

Powers.name: Super Jump
Powers.desc: Your jump distance is tripled

Powers.name: Misty Step
Powers.desc: As a bonus action, you teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space that you can see

Powers.name: Natural Armor
Powers.desc: When you aren't wearing armor, your AC is 13 + your Dexterity modifier

Powers.name: Paralysis
Powers.desc: As an action, choose a humanoid that you can see; the target must succeed a WIS save or be paralyzed for 1 minute. At the end of each of its turns, it can make another WIS save. On a success the paralysis ends. If you target another humanoid with this trait, the paralysis ends. This trait requires 'INT/WIS/CHA Concentration'

Powers.name: Powerful Build
Powers.desc: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag, or lift

Powers.name: Spider Climb
Powers.desc: You are able to move up, down, and across vertical surfaces and upside down along ceilings, while leaving your hands free. Your climbing speed equals your walking speed

Powers.name: Speed: Aggressive
Powers.desc: As a bonus action, you can move up to your speed toward an enemy of your choice that you can see or hear. You must end this move closer to the enemy than you started

Powers.name: Speed: Haste
Powers.desc: As an action, you gain the following effects: your speed is doubled, you gain a +2 bonus to AC, have advantage on Dexterity saving throws, and gain an additional action on each of your turns. That action can be used only to Attack (one weapon attack only), Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Use an Object. After 1 minute, you can't move or take actions until after its next turn

Powers.name: Speed: Feline Agility
Powers.desc: When you move on your turn, you can double your speed until the end of your turn. Once you use this, you can't use it again until you move 0 feet in one of your turns

Powers.name: Speed: Swim Speed
Powers.desc: Your swim speed matches your base speed

Powers.name: Regenerative
Powers.desc: You regain 1 hit point at the start of your turn / every 6 seconds. Any severed body parts are restored after 2 minutes. This trait doesn't activate when you have 0 hit points. Your Strength and Dexterity score decreases by 2

Powers.name: Resistance: Acid
Powers.desc: You have resistance to acid damage

Powers.name: Resistance: Cold
Powers.desc: You have resistance to cold damage

Powers.name: Resistance: Fire
Powers.desc: You have resistance to fire damage

Powers.name: Resistance: Force
Powers.desc: You have resistance to force damage

Powers.name: Resistance: Lightning
Powers.desc: You have resistance to lightning damage

Powers.name: Resistance: Necrotic
Powers.desc: You have resistance to necrotic damage

Powers.name: Resistance: Poison
Powers.desc: You have resistance to poison damage

Powers.name: Resistance: Physical
Powers.desc: You have resistance to physical damage; your ability scores each decrease by 2

Powers.name: Resistance: Psychic
Powers.desc: You have resistance to psychic damage

Powers.name: Resistance: Radiant
Powers.desc: You have resistance to radiant damage

Powers.name: Resistance: Thunder
Powers.desc: You have resistance to thunder damage

Powers.name: Telepathy
Powers.desc: In a 30 foot radius, you are able to communicate through your thoughts; the language barrier still exists
